scripts.generate-v2: node -r esm -r dotenv/config download-airtable-data.js ./download-airtable-data-config.json && node process-airtable-data.js
scripts.generate-v1: node -r esm -r dotenv/config download-airtable-data.js ./download-airtable-data-config.json && node generate-static-countries-files-for-public-website.js && get-worldbank-data.js && inject-indicators-into-countries.js
